entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's snowy owl. She clicked her beak and fluttered down onto Harry's arm (line 2).

entities.name: tom
entities.description: Tom is a person who met Harry at the airport. He complimented Harry on his owl, Hedwig (lines 3-4).

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story. He gasped when he saw Hedwig (line 1) and later sat on his bed stroking her (lines 9-10).

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: Privet Drive is Harry's home address. He left it only a few hours ago (line 12).

relationships.description: Harry owns Hedwig, as evidenced by the fact that he is stroking her on his bed (lines 9-10).
Tom met Harry at the airport and complimented him on his owl, Hedwig (lines 3-4).
